ProductsPage.head: Our products
ProductsPage.spheres: Areas of application of our products
ProductsPage.text1: The main products of Swartz Mayer are mobile security systems integrated into the overall system of protected objects. Our products are also used on combat contact lines and for the protection of headquarters and strategic positions. In addition, the company produces technical means and equipment that serve security purposes:

blocks1.1: Video cameras and special surveillance systems
blocks1.5: Thermal Imaging Mounts and Payloads for UAVs

ProductsPage.text2: Swartz Mayer products are used in the following areas:

blocks2.4: For perimeter protection of public and private facilities
blocks2.5: In industry – to prevent emergency situations
blocks2.7: And in other areas of public life

ProductsPage.request: Didn't find a solution? Write to our experts!

AboutPage.head: About the company
AboutPage.aboutText1: Swartz Mayer is a growing international company engaged in the development and production of video surveillance systems used in the protection of military and civilian facilities. The range includes: thermal imagers, video cameras, modules, drones and software.
AboutPage.aboutText2: The efficiency and reliability of our products are confirmed by our customers; more than 10 Russian enterprises have already become our clients.
AboutPage.slogan:
The company's motto is -
 "Safety ahead of its time."
AboutPage.aboutText3: We will help solve almost any problem related to military strongpoint systems. We will develop a system for your needs and conditions. BART complexes have proven themselves as a light, convenient and technological solution for protecting dugouts, strongpoints, headquarters. Our complexes serve to protect state borders.
AboutPage.aboutBart: The history of the BART system began in 2022. Then a difficult task was set - to create a high-tech, protected, lightweight and easy-to-use system to protect and save the lives of military personnel. The BART Version 1.0 system was developed. The complex proved itself to be effective in the field, earning recognition among the military. Since then, the BART complex has been refined and modified into an entire ecosystem. At the moment, the BART line is developing and is in great demand.

paragraphs.1: The company's employees have specialized higher education.
Reliability and quality of equipment, ease of use, best characteristics.
paragraphs.2: We are your reliable partners, and our support does not end after the completion of the project, we are ready to assist at any stage.

TeamPage.head: Our team
TeamPage.text: Our team consists of professionals. We have accumulated a wealth of experience, valuable personnel and technologies. We are approached not only to solve problems and target tasks, but also for expert opinion. We keep feedback with the customer, which allows us to refine and improve our product. Together with our customers we achieve great results.
TeamPage.chat:
Let us know your problem and together we will
find the best way to solve it!

1.name: LLC STC “SOYUZ”
1.description: Works in the field of design, manufacture, installation and commissioning of modern non-standard technological and auxiliary equipment and fixtures required to equip or modernize factories/shops/sites for the manufacture and repair of military equipment, including armored vehicles, as well as for field repair.

2.name: SRC Solutions Ltd.
2.description: The company develops and implements information systems, including both customized and universal solutions. The company's assets include solutions for enterprises of different orientation. All proposed systems successfully work in various organizations.

block1.head: Payment for orders
block1.text: Payment for orders by bank transfer by invoice, as well as you can pay in cash. After payment of the invoice amount, the manager will contact you to agree on the terms of delivery.

1.title: Delivery in Russia
1.text: We use transportation companies for delivery. Terms and cost of delivery are determined by these companies and their transportation tariffs. The payer for transportation is agreed in advance by our manager with the customer.

2.title: Delivery to other countries
2.text: Possible delivery by transportation companies, paid separately.

ContactsPage.head: Contacts
ContactsPage.addressText: Russia, Moscow, Troitsk, Promyshlennaya St., 19 p.1
